solution_line_template: Winwin paid ${initial_winnings} x {tax_percentage} = $<<{initial_winnings}*{tax_percentage}={tax_amount}>>{tax_amount} for the tax.
So, she has ${initial_winnings} - ${tax_amount} = <<{initial_winnings}-{tax_amount}={winnings_after_tax}>>{winnings_after_tax} after paying the tax.

Therefore, Winwin was able to take home ${winnings_after_tax} - ${processing_fee} = $<<{winnings_after_tax}-{processing_fee}={take_home_amount}>>{take_home_amount} after she paid for the processing fee.
